values: Bible Reading Has Been My Life: Personal Reflections for Christian FathersBible Reading Has Been My Life: Personal Reflections for Christian Fathers

What does Bible reading look like for John Piper? In this message to fathers, he tells personal stories and shares how he has weaved Bible reading into all of life.What does Bible reading look like for John Piper? In this message to fathers, he tells personal stories and shares how he has weaved Bible reading into all of life.
